item.title: Installing R and RStudio
item.description: -- -- Installing steps The first steps to get started with R is installing it on your computer. Depending on the version of your OS (Windows/Linux/MacOS) you are required to download the right R version. Download the necessary installation files from the R-project. This website will not only allow you to download R but also provide some additional help in case something should go wrong (which it shouldn’t so don’t worry!
